en-US.start.user:
Hello, %{username}.

❓ To use the bot, make sure you have lastfm account and press /connect

❗ If you don't have one, press /nolastfm for useful info

❤ Find detailed info at /help
en-US.start.hacker:
%{username},
you have %{qty} accounts saved: %{accs}.
To add and delete accounts, use /connect and /disconnect
en-US.disconn_lfm_conversation.choose_acc: Choose lastfm's profile name to disconnect:
en-US.disconn_lfm_conversation.acc_not_found: Bot had waited for account name to disconnect, but _%{acc}_ was not found. Try /disconnect again
en-US.conn_lfm_conversation.max_acc_reached: Sorry, maximum %{qty} accounts possible at the moment. Use /disconnect to remove accounts
en-US.conn_lfm_conversation.some_error: Sorry, somehow bot can't add your account
en-US.conn_lfm_conversation.alarm_info:
Bot will notify you each day at %{time} UTC if there will be new events.
Press /getgigs to check events anytime you want
en-US.news_builders.403:
Oops! We get error *403*: it seems _%{acc}_'s tracks are private.
Change your Last.fm user settings to use this bot
en-US.news_builders.404: Ops! We get error *404*: it seems _%{acc}_ is not a correct Last.fm username
en-US.news_builders.some_error: We get error *%{err}* when load tracks from Last.fm for %{acc}. We'll check that soon
en-US.nolastfm.message:
If you don't have *lastfm account*, just [register](https://www.last.fm/join/) one.
It is free and great service since 2002
⬇
Add your *music service* like iTunes, Spotify, Yandex.Music, etc. to your new account in [settings](https://www.last.fm/settings/applications) of lastfm website
⬇
Press /connect. Enter *lastfm account* name and forget about the bot
✅
Bot will send you notification, when it find new concerts.
Notes:
• Bot works only with *public accounts* at this moment
• You can add accounts of your frinds or family members — and, may be, go to event together?
